content.rendered:
• This 100% natural and innovative product, developed by the renowned Dr. Peter Josling, is a cutting-edge solution designed to support vitality and overall wellness. This advanced supplement combines a unique blend of four powerful ingredients that promote energy, balance, and overall vitality.

Key Benefits:

  • Vitality and Well-Being: Specially selected ingredients promote overall vitality and improves reproductive wellness.
  • Stress Management: May help reduce stress and anxiety, supporting better mental and physical balance.
  • Hormonal Support: Aids in maintaining hormonal balance for optimal reproductive health in both men and women.
  • Increased Energy: May boost energy levels and enhance overall stamina for daily activities.

Direction of use:

  • Take 1-2 capsules daily with a meal.
  • Or as directed by your health care physician.
  • Daily intake must not exceed 4 capsules.
  • Women who are pregnant should check with their health provider before using.

Suitable for: Adults of 16 years and over.

Ingredients:Active ingredients – Allicin Extract (garlic bulb) Gotukola Extract, Ashwagandha Extract, Shatavari Extract. Excipients

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
